plugin.name: adb
plugin.author: Athlau

muclient.triggers:
<trigger enabled="y" match="^{invmon}(?\d+)\,(?\d+)\,.+\,.+$" regexp="y" send_to="12" sequence="100" script="adbOnInvmonTrigger" name="adbInvmonTrigger" omit_from_output="y" >
<trigger enabled="n" match="^{invitem}(?\d+),(.*?),(?
.*),(.*?),(.*?),(.*?),(.*?),(.*?)$" regexp="y" send_to="12" sequence="100" name="adbInvitemTrigger" group="adbLootTriggerGroup" omit_from_output="y" script="adbOnInvitemTrigger" >
<trigger enabled="n" match="^You get (?:(?[0-9,]+) gold coins?|(?:(?\d+) \* )?(?
.*)) from the(?: \w+,?)?(?: \w+,?)? (?:corpse|torso) of (?.*)\.$" regexp="y" send_to="12" sequence="10" keep_evaluating="y" group="adbLootTriggerGroup" script="adbOnItemLootedTrigger" >
<trigger enabled="n" match="^You get (?
.*) from the(?: \w+,?)?(?: \w+)? (?:corpse|torso) of (?.*)\.\n(?i)\1(?-i) crumbles into (?[0-9,]+) gold pieces?.\n\Z" regexp="y" send_to="12" sequence="100" keep_evaluating="y" lines_to_match="2" multi_line="y" group="adbLootTriggerGroup" script="adbOnItemLootedCrumblesTrigger" >
<trigger enabled="n" name="adbBlootNameTrigger" match="^(?!\| Name \:)(?!{invitem}).*\((?Polished|Enhanced|Burnished|Shiny|Vibrant|Sparkling|Gleaming|Shimmering|Dazzling|Brilliant|Radiant|Wondrous|Majestic|Exalted|Eternal|Legendary|Epic|Mythical|Fabled|Divine|Godly)\).*$" regexp="y" send_to="12" sequence="10000" keep_evaluating="y" omit_from_output="y" script="adbOnBlootNameTrigger" >
muclient.aliases:
<alias script="adbOnIdentifyCommand" match="^aid (?[^\s]+)(? worn)?(?: (?(?!format\.).+?))?(?: (?format\..+))?$" regexp="y" enabled="y" send_to="12" sequence="100" >
<alias script="adbOnAIDECommand" match="^aide(?: (?\d+))?(?: (?enchanted))?(?: (?removable))?(?: S(?\d+))?(?: I(?\d+))?(?: R(?\d+))?(?: (?format\..+))?$" regexp="y" enabled="y" send_to="12" sequence="100" >
<alias script="adbOnDebugLevel" match="^adb_debug_level (?\d+)$" regexp="y" enabled="y" send_to="12" sequence="100" >
<alias script="adbOnOptionsCommand" match="^adb options(?: set (?[^\s]+) (?[^\s]+)(?: (?.*))?)?$" regexp="y" enabled="y" send_to="12" sequence="100" >
adb options set cockpit enable_auto_actions false
adb options set cockpit enable_auto_actions true
<alias script="adbOnFormatAdd" match="^adb format add (?format\..+)(?: (?format\..+))?$" regexp="y" enabled="y" send_to="12" sequence="100" >
<alias script="adbOnFormatRemove" match="^adb format remove(?: (?format\..+))?$" regexp="y" enabled="y" send_to="12" sequence="100" >
<alias script="adbOnFormatEdit" match="^adb format edit(?: (?format\..+))?$" regexp="y" enabled="y" send_to="12" sequence="100" >
<alias script="adbOnAdbFind" match="^adb find (?.+?)(?: (?format\..+))?$" regexp="y" enabled="y" send_to="12" sequence="100" >
